mars_solar_irradiance_w_m2.note: Top-of-atmosphere approximate range near Mars orbit.

surface_noon_insolation_equator_w_m2.note: Order-of-magnitude daytime surface value, affected by atmosphere and dust.

mars_average_surface_pressure_pa.note: Approximate pressure range at representative elevations.

mars_mean_surface_temp_c.note: Global mean; local and seasonal variation is large.

rack_8gpu_server_power_kw.note: Depends on GPU class, CPU, cooling, utilization.
